snippet: Officials from the Navy, Coast Guard and California Air National Guard said Tuesday that they would not seek reimbursement for rescuing an ill 1-year-old girl and her family off the Mexican coast.
abstract: Officials from the Navy, Coast Guard and California Air National Guard say they will not seek reimbursement for rescuing an ill 1-year-old girl and her family off the Mexican coast.
lead_paragraph: Officials from the Navy, Coast Guard and California Air National Guard said Tuesday that they would not seek reimbursement for rescuing an ill 1-year-old girl and her family off the Mexican coast.

headline.main: California: No Charge for Ocean Rescue of Family
headline.print_headline: California: No Charge for Ocean Rescue
